ygData.subject: Where is that pet?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, Does anyone else feel that the fact that there is no hot-key for selecting your pet is just VERY annoying? On numerous times, especially when
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

Does anyone else feel that the fact that there is no hot-key for selecting
your pet is just VERY annoying?
On numerous times, especially when fighting big critters, i found myself
clicking in frenzy on my pet, wishing that i would catch
the pixel that belongs to him, and then switching back to the critter etc
etc etc.
Has someone found any efficient way for selecting your pet while in combat?
Why not have those hot-keys that select the nearest npcs point to your pet
first? i think we should demand this from verant, as i find it to be highly
annoying.

death to all,

trenzorian/tunare

If we aren't supposed to eat animals , why are they made of meat?
